title: UPDATE: Toddler in stable condition after accidental shooting
content:
A 2-year-old boy is in stable condition after he accidentally shot himself over the weekend.
Dispatchers say the call came in around 12:30 a.m. on Saturday from the 2700 block of Edison Road in South Bend.
The toddler was as home at when he accidentally shot himself.
He was taken to Memorial Hospital for treatment.
Police have interviewed all three adults who were in the house at the time, and the Special Victims Unit is still investigating the case.
No arrests have been made and no charges have been filed yet in connection with the accidental shooting.
